distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for csync2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-15522: Fixed an issue where daemon fails to enforce TLS (bsc#1147137)
- CVE-2019-15523: Fixed an incorrect TLS handshake error handling (bsc#1147139)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in LINBIT csync2 through 2.0. csync_daemon_session in daemon.c neglects to force a failure of a hello command when the configuration requires use of SSL.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: An issue was discovered in LINBIT csync2 through 2.0. It does not correctly check for the return value GNUTLS_E_WARNING_ALERT_RECEIVED of the gnutls_handshake() function. It neglects to call this function again, as required by the design of the API.
notes.title: CVE description
